content: MT-CC-40D OC U-Fitting Clamp for channel-to-channel or channel-to-girder cross-connections with MT strut channel, for outdoor use with low pollution ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Compatible with MT Twist-Lock and MT Thread Forming Bolt channel connectors – for much faster, adaptable assembly Universal – complete many different applications using few parts Twist-lock and Thread Forming Bolt channel connector takes up shear and tensile loads Compatible with multiple strut channel/girder profiles Corrosion resistance – hot-dip galvanized to help protect against moisture and chemical corrosion Applications Cross-connection of one strut channel to another channel or girder Suitable for use in moderately corrosive environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Q235 or better steel Surface finish: Outdoor Coated - HDG Material thickness: 4 mm Technical Data | Material composition | Q235 or better steel | Surface finish | Outdoor Coated - HDG | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) ### ITEMS- 2322399 - Clamp MT-CC-40D OC - Package Size 10 pc
